actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the establishment of certain standards relating to gasoline tanks.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to establish standards to require that gasoline tank openings shall not be placed near the front or rear of motor vehicles.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the establishment of certain standards relating to gasoline tanks.
